TestCase Steps: 1. Login as test_user; 2. Go to Shop; 3. Search 'Case of Red Wine'; 4. Add to Cart; 5. Checkout; 6. Pay with CC
Precondition: User is registered and has a valid CC

Objective: Login should fail with error when wrong password supplied
Steps: 1. Open login screen; 2. Use bad password; 3. Check error
